alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 1:19PM PST until December 12 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, except 8 to 16 inches over the mountains. Baker City will see snowfall of 1 to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Baker County zone. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue to fall above 4000 feet on Sunday and Monday, but additional impacts will be minor.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
